intro.title: I took back my life
intro.subtitle: You can too
intro.text: The day I turned 52, I looked in the mirror and did not recognise the woman staring back at me. I had lost my energy, enthusiasm and figure. I looked like I felt - old, flabby and tired. I had two choices - continue down this road, or I could take back my life. Nine months later I had transformed my body and my life. In 2018, my husband and I launched Committed Bodies Gym. We specialise in transformations - our mission is to help you take back your life.

video.title: Your journey starts now!
video.subtitle: Not yet ready for a membership package?

sections.text: Willpower plays a much smaller role than we think. Actually, character trumps will-power when it comes to body transformation. You can create rules which define the type of person you want to be. Go ahead - look yourself in the mirror and say, "I'm the type of person who enjoys a healthy, active life." You're creating a character rule - these affirmations are more effective and use less psychological energy than trying to resist short-term temptation.
sections.subtitle: Not a will-power comittment
sections.title: Make a character commitment

sections.text: A gym membership gets you more than access to free weights and treadmills. With a gym membership, you can feel your body and mind transform with every visit. We have affordable memberships to suit any lifestyle.
sections.subtitle: Select a membership
sections.title: Put some skin in the game

sections.text: Trainers can help you get that body you have always dreamt of. Our trainers are always here to help.
sections.subtitle: Book a trainer
sections.title: Find a mentor

sections.text: We’re constantly striving to offer you effective, exciting classes and services. Your healthy lifestyle should also be fun! If you’re looking for a specific type of workout or class that’s not in our offering, please let us know.
sections.subtitle: One day at a time

sections.text: Our flagship 12 week transformation program is designed to sculpt your body, improve fitness and increase your strength. We can and will help you change your body and take back your life.
